p.s: As stated in the summary, the speech is about the importance of intercultural understanding and student exchanges.
Now I will analyse the speech.
As already said in the summary, the speech is divided into three paragraphs.
In the first paragraph, he explains briefly why he came to Turkey.
In the second paragraph, he names reasons which confirm his thesis.
Apart from that he gives insights in his own experiences, which helps the reader to understand his point of view.
For example l. 5 I saw it in my own presidential campaign where young people provided the energy and the idealism that made effort possible.
In the last section he appeals to young people to cross their borders.
His choice of words is formal, but he uses many adjectives which makes it vivid for the reader.
In line 18 it says to all of you, this personal call, gives the reader a new feeling of being part of the group.
In line 19 Obama says build new bridges instead of building new walls this contrast makes the importance of the topic clear.
During the holewhole speech, he argues pro his thesis.
